title: 1. {'action': 'fill', 'target': "input[name='jobDescription']", 'value': '2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience'}
2. {'action': 'click', 'target': "button[type='submit']"}
expected_result: ** AI suggests questions based on the job description

title: 2. {'action': 'assert', 'target': 'div.skills-recommendations', 'expected': 'Key skills extracted from the job description'}

expected_result: ** The candidate's structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resume are displayed

title: 1. Navigate to the interview screenings section

title: 1. Navigate to the interview screenings section

title: 2. Upload multiple resumes

title: 1. Navigate to the resume screening section

expected_result: ** The candidate's resume score and AI recommendation are displayed

title: ### Sending an interview link to a candidate
1. Navigate to the resume screening section
3. Click the 'Send Interview Link' button
expected_result: ** The interview link is sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours

title: 2. Click on a candidate's response
